Pelikan Docs
============


**Pelikan**  is the unified cache backend framework that provides all
executables for accessing and storing cached data.
`go/pelikan <http://go/pelikan>`_ points here.

Subscribe to `cache-user <cache-user@twitter.com>`_ for announcements, send
feedback and questions to `cache-team <cache-team@twitter>`_.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   history
   overview
   use_cases
   problems
   anatomy


The status of this documentation project is `under initial construction`.
